documents.title: Technical Requirements Document
documents.content: This document outlines the technical requirements for the website redesign project. The new website should be built using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. It should support modern web standards and be optimized for performance.
documents.author: John Doe

documents.title: User Research Report
documents.content: Based on user interviews and surveys, we found that users want a faster, more intuitive interface. Key findings include: 1) Current navigation is confusing, 2) Page load times are too slow, 3) Mobile experience needs improvement.
documents.author: Jane Smith

tasks.title: Conduct user interviews
tasks.description: Interview 10 users to understand their needs and pain points
